T02D3769:140b-0: rim pa 'di kho na bzhin du sngags 'di rnams kyis chu snyim pa gsum @140b sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3769:140b-1: de nas thams cad phur bu las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3769:140b-3: mdzub mo 'dus byas gung mo sbyar //
T02D3769:140b-4: mthe bong rdo rje brtan por sbyar //
T02D3769:140b-5: de ni dpral ba'i dbus bzhag nas //
T02D3769:140b-6: bskor zhing bskor nas bskyod par bya //
T02D3769:140b-7: lho ru lus ni bltas byas nas //
T02D3769:140b-8: gcer bu skra ni bshig gyur cing //
T02D3769:140b-9: drag cing khros pa'i sems ldan pas //
T02D3769:140b-10: thun gsum du ni gtor ma sbyin //
T02D3769:140b-11: yang na rked pa'i phyogs su lag pa g-yon pa
T02D3769:140b-12: dril bu dang bcas pa bzhag la g-yas pas bsnyems
T02D3769:140b-13: tshul dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gsor zhing gtor ma
T02D3769:140b-14: sbyin par bya'o // yang na gung mo dang srin
T02D3769:140b-15: lag dag bkug nas de dag gi rtsa bar mthe
T02D3769:140b-16: bong bcug ste mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung dag lcags
T02D3769:140b-17: kyu'i rnam par bya zhing lag pa g-yon pa'i tshigs
T02D3769:140b-18: rgyab tu lag pa g-yas pa'i rgyab tshigs gzhag ste
T02D3769:140b-19: snying ga'i gnas su bzhag par bya'o //
T02D3769:140b-20: de lta bu de yang gtor ma'i phyag rgya yin no //
T02D3769:140b-21: thun mtshams thams cad du rgyu'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3769:140b-22: de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis aom aa mri
T02D3769:140b-23: te h'um phat ces pa'i sngags brjod pas sgrub pa
T02D3769:140b-24: pos srung ba byas nas thor tshugs bcing bar byas
T02D3769:140b-29: chu bo dag tu gtor mdor bar bya ba'am bkres pa rnams la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3769:140b-30: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi rdul tshon chu bo la dbo bar bya'o //
T02D3769:140b-31: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi ba'i lci bas byugs la
T02D3769:140b-32: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D3769:140b-34: bsod nams yongs su bsngos te /
T02D3769:140b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas
T02D3769:140b-36: bskor ba byas te langs nas khyed kyis zhes bya
T02D3769:140b-38: ngo mtshar gyi phyag rgyas btab la rang gi lha'i
T02D3769:140b-39: nga rgyal gyis spyod lam rnam bzhi'i sgo nas ji
T02D3769:140b-41: de ni bgegs rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o /
T02D3769:140b-43: // / gdon dang phyogs skyong tshim bya'i phyir //
T02D3769:140b-44: dpung bzangs rgyud las ji skad gsungs //
T02D3769:140b-45: gtor ma'i las ni lung bzhin du //
T02D3769:140b-46: de nas dang por rab bshad bya //
T02D3769:141a-1: por sngar bshad pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba la
T02D3769:141a-2: sogs pa nye bar bsogs te cha gnyis su byas
T02D3769:141a-3: nas cha gcig la gdon rnams tshim par bya ba'i
T02D3769:141a-4: phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams brjod par bya'o
T02D3769:141a-5: // lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //
T02D3769:141a-6: nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzang lus srul po //
T02D3769:141a-7: dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang //
T02D3769:141a-8: gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
T02D3769:141a-9: bdag cag pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni //
T02D3769:141a-10: thal sbyar khyed rnams la yang gsol 'de bas na //
T02D3769:141a-11: bu smad bcas shing g-yog 'khor bcas pa rnams //
T02D3769:141a-12: gsan nas phan 'dogs slad du 'dir sbyon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang //
T02D3769:141a-13: dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yul kun gnas dang //
T02D3769:141a-14: shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang //
T02D3769:141a-15: grong khyer kun na gang dag gnas pa dang //
T02D3769:141a-16: chu bo kun dang chu bo'i ngogs rnams dang //
T02D3769:141a-17: rin chen gnas na lhag par gang gnas dang //
T02D3769:141a-18: rdzing dang mtsho dang lu ma lteng ka dang //
T02D3769:141a-19: khron pa dang ni ngam grog chu mig dang //
T02D3769:141a-20: grong dang phyugs lhas dang ni nags tshal dang //
T02D3769:141a-21: khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang //
T02D3769:141a-22: gang dag gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas //
T02D3769:141a-23: so nam khyim dang glang po'i khang rnams dang //
T02D3769:141a-24: gang dag rgyal po'i dkor khang gnas pa dang //
T02D3769:141a-25: srang dang khyams dang grong dang 'dun sa dang //
T02D3769:141a-26: gang dag shing gcig drung dang lam chen gnas //
T02D3769:141a-27: dur khrod dang ni nags tshal che gnas dang //
T02D3769:141a-28: seng ge glang chen dred kyi gnas rnams dang ;
T02D3769:141a-29: /'jigs su rung ba'i dgon pa che gnas dang //
T02D3769:141a-30: chu gling mchog dag tu ni gnas bcas dang //
T02D3769:141a-31: gang dag 'brog dgon dur khrod gnas na gnas //
T02D3769:141a-32: dga' zhing mgu nas dri dang me tog phreng //
T02D3769:141a-33: spos dang me tog mar me gus phul ba //
T02D3769:141a-34: 'di dag bsnams te so sor bzhes nas kyang //
T02D3769:141a-35: las 'di dag gi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02D3769:141a-36: gdon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de ltar bya ste /
T02D3769:141a-37: de nas cha gcig la phyogs skyong rnams la mchod
T02D3769:141a-38: par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams
T02D3769:141b-0: brjod par bya'o // shar phyogs rdo rje can @141b te lha tshogs bcas //
T02D3769:141b-1: gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol //
T02D3769:141b-2: me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag / chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang //
T02D3769:141b-3: steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang //
T02D3769:141b-4: lha rnams ma lus sa yi klu dag dang //
T02D3769:141b-5: ri yi lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs 'dus la //
T02D3769:141b-6: so so so sor gtor ma phul ba rnams //
T02D3769:141b-7: rang rang gi ni phyogs su bzhugs nas kyang //
T02D3769:141b-8: rang gi bu smad grogs dang g-yog 'khor bcas //
T02D3769:141b-9: dpung dang sde bcas mnyes nas bzhes su gsol //
T02D3769:141b-10: spos dang me tog gtor ma lha bshos ni //
T02D3769:141b-11: 'di dag bzhes shing so sor bsnams nas kyang //
T02D3769:141b-12: bya ba 'di ni 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02D3769:141b-13: 'di ni bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i don du'am /
T02D3769:141b-14: dgos pa gzhan 'dod pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D3769:141b-15: gtor ma 'di la sngags rnams ni //
T02D3769:141b-16: kun du 'byung ba med mod kyi //
T02D3769:141b-17: 'on kyang tshigs bcad tsam gyis ni //
T02D3769:141b-19: dka' thub mthu dang bden pa rnams //
T02D3769:141b-20: lhag par yang dag thob 'gyur ba //
T02D3769:141b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lung ni //
T02D3769:141b-23: slu ba med pa'i tshig gang yin //
T02D3769:141b-24: de ni gsang sngags nyid du 'dod //
T02D3769:141b-25: mu stegs kyis ni bstan pa'i sngags //
T02D3769:141b-26: de nyid phyir na chad ma min //
T02D3769:141b-27: de bas dngos grub thob rnams kyi //
T02D3769:141b-28: tshig gang de sngags nyid yin te //
T02D3769:141b-29: spyod lam bzhi po de dag ni //
T02D3769:141b-30: phyag rgya nyid du bshad pa yin //
T02D3769:141b-31: de bas gtor ma'i las 'di la //
T02D3769:141b-32: tshigs bcad gsang sngags nyid du 'grub //
T02D3769:141b-33: de bas 'dir ni sv'a h'a sogs //
T02D3769:141b-34: spel ba'i sngags ni dgos pa med //
T02D3769:141b-35: de ni gdon dang phyogs skyong rnams kyi gtor ma'i cho ga'o /
T02D3769:141b-37: // / dkyil 'khor thams cad tshim bya'i phyir //
T02D3769:141b-38: dus kyi 'khor lo las gsungs pa //
T02D3769:141b-39: gtor ma'i las ni shin tu gsang //
T02D3769:141b-40: de bzhen gshegs dang lha mo rnams //
T02D3769:141b-42: khro bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis //
T02D3769:141b-43: sum cu drug gi bar gsal bar //
T02D3769:141b-44: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya //
T02D3769:141b-45: dang po sbyor ba sogs dbye bas //
T02D3769:141b-47: de yi mtha' mar rnal 'byor pas //
T02D3769:142a-2: ye shes 'khor lo rang snying nas //
T02D3769:142a-3: sna yi bu ga g-yas dang g-yon //
T02D3769:142a-4: gnyis nas kun du spro bya zhing //
T02D3769:142a-5: dkyil 'khor la ni yang dag dgod //
T02D3769:142a-6: chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyogs kyi mtha' //
T02D3769:142a-7: bzhi po las kyang mkha' 'gro sogs //
T02D3769:142a-8: gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi las //
T02D3769:142a-9: rab tu gtum mo la sogs spro //
T02D3769:142a-10: khva yi gdong can la sogs pa //
T02D3769:142a-11: thams cad za byed mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D3769:142a-12: rul ba'i dri ldan la sogs sgo //
T02D3769:142a-13: dur khrod rnams nas yang dag spro //
T02D3769:142a-15: mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor mchog / mthong nas mchod yon zhabs bsil sogs //
T02D3769:142a-16: sngar bzhin rnal 'byor so sor dbul //
T02D3769:142a-17: de nas sngar bzhin chu skyes sogs //
T02D3769:142a-18: rnal 'byor pas ni rnam par bsam //
T02D3769:142a-19: bdud rtsi lnga yang bsam par bya //
T02D3769:142a-20: rang gi sa bon byin brlabs shing //
T02D3769:142a-22: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du //
T02D3769:142a-23: de dag brtul zhugs chen pos bsam //
T02D3769:142a-24: de nas rnam par sbyang ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi tshig ni 'di rnams yin no //
T02D3769:142a-25: aom na ma:shr'i badzra d'a ki ya aom a'a:h'um /
T02D3769:142a-26: yi ge aom gyis sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D3769:142a-27: yi ge a'a:yis spel bar bya'o //
T02D3769:142a-28: yi ge h'um gis bdud rtsir bya'o //
T02D3769:142a-29: lag pa g-yon pas sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D3769:142a-30: lag pa g-yas pas rtogs par bya'o //
T02D3769:142a-31: thal mo bkab nas spar bar bya'o //
T02D3769:142a-32: nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgyas zla bzhu ba'i rang bzhin du bdud rtsir bya'o //
T02D3769:142a-33: de nas g-yon pa'i srin lag gis dbus nas thig
T02D3769:142a-34: le blangs te sa la chos 'byung gru gsum bya
T02D3769:142a-35: zhing ; de'i nang du zlum po'i thig le'i gzugs can bya'o //
T02D3769:142a-36: de'i nang du me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du
T02D3769:142a-37: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsam zhing de
T02D3769:142a-43: li l'i zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa
T02D3769:142a-44: la sogs pa'i phung po rnams dang nam mkha' la
T02D3769:142a-52: aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba ni dbang po drug go //
T02D3769:142a-57: ha h'a zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi sku can gyi khro bo bcu dang /
T02D3769:142b-0: las kyi dbang po dang zhe sdang rdo rje la @142b sogs pa'i bdag nyid can dag go //
T02D3769:142b-1: ka k'a kha kh'a ga g'a gha gh'a nga ng'a /
T02D3769:142b-2: tsa ts'a tsha tsh'a dza dz'a dzha dzh'a nya ny'a /
T02D3769:142b-3: ta t'a tha th'a da d'a dha dh'a na n'a /
T02D3769:142b-4: pa p'a pha ph'a ba b'a bha bh'a ma m'a /
T02D3769:142b-5: ta t'a tha th'a da d'a dha dh'a na n'a /
T02D3769:142b-6: sha sh'a sha sh'a sa s'a ha h'a tshya tshy'a ha h'a /
T02D3769:142b-7: ya y'a ra r'a wa w'a la l'a ksha ksh'a
T02D3769:142b-8: zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi rigs
T02D3769:142b-9: sum cu rtsa drug tshim par bya ba'i cho ga'i
T02D3769:142b-10: sngags so // de ltar brjod nas dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3769:142b-11: 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma tshim par bya ba'i phyir
T02D3769:142b-12: srin lag dang mthe bong dag gis thig le phul
T02D3769:142b-13: sngags so // te / dkyil 'khor rang gi yan lag la bsdu bar byas nas /
T02D3769:142b-14: rang gi kha mtshan ma gcig par bdud rtsi lnga'i
T02D3769:142b-15: thig le mkha' 'gro ma'i grangs dang mnyam pa sngags
T02D3769:142b-17: aom sarba kro dha d'a ka n+ya ai mam ba
T02D3769:142b-18: lim pra t'i tstshantu sa ma ya ma nu sma
T02D3769:142b-20: de nas yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i don du yang sngags 'di brjod par bya ste /
T02D3769:142b-21: aom di by'an ne sa m'a dhi dhya na pri na ne sv'a h'a /
T02D3769:142b-22: de'i rjes la mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo ma lus
T02D3769:142b-23: pa yongs su mnyes par gyur nas khams gsum pa
T02D3769:142b-24: yang de kho na bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3769:142b-25: de nas langs te ye shes kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol ba /
T02D3769:142b-26: dam tshig gi 'khor lo nang du bcug ste /
T02D3769:142b-27: smon lam btab la bsod nams yongs su bsngos te /
T02D3769:142b-28: rang gi lha'i nga rgyal du dmigs la snang ba
T02D3769:142b-29: tsam gyis rang gi ngo bo'i spyod lam rnams kyis
T02D3769:142b-30: gnas par bya'o // de ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D3769:142b-31: man ngag gi rim pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma
T02D3769:142b-32: rnams kyi gtor ma'i cho ga'o /
T02D3769:142b-34: // / gang gi lus ni rab rgyas shing //
T02D3769:142b-35: bde ba chen po thob 'gyur ba //
T02D3769:142b-36: yi dags tshim byed gtor ma ni //
T02D3769:142b-37: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya //
T02D3769:142b-38: dang po chu ni drag zug pa'i //
T02D3769:142b-39: chu bo nub bltas song nas ni //
T02D3769:142b-40: lag pa la sogs bkrus nas ni //
T02D3769:142b-41: gus pa yis ni bzlas par bya //
T02D3769:142b-42: padma'i phreng ba blangs nas ni //
T02D3769:142b-43: mkhas pas brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas //
T02D3769:142b-44: sngags ni yi ge drug pa ste //
T02D3769:142b-45: dngos su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D3769:142b-46: aom dang ma ni padme dang //
T02D3769:142b-47: h'um gi mtha' can sngags rgyal po //
T02D3769:142b-48: yi dags rnams kyi bkres skom sogs //
T02D3769:142b-49: nyon mongs gdung ba 'dzoms byed pa //
T02D3769:142b-51: zhi ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs //
T02D3769:143a-2: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
T02D3769:143a-3: mchog sbyin chu skyes dag gis mtshan /
T02D3769:143a-4: thugs rje'i rang gi shugs kyis ni //
T02D3769:143a-5: gdung par 'gyur ba'i yid mnga' ba //
T02D3769:143a-6: mtsho skyes chen po'i ge sar gyi //
T02D3769:143a-7: lte ba'i dbus na yang dag bzhugs //
T02D3769:143a-8: skyil krung phyed par bzhugs gyur pa //
T02D3769:143a-9: 'od dpag med pas dbu rgyan byas //
T02D3769:143a-10: zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan gyur cing //
T02D3769:143a-12: sdug bsngal gsum gyis sdug bsngal gyur //
T02D3769:143a-13: ma lus 'gro ba skyob brtson pa //
T02D3769:143a-14: rnal 'byor pas ni bdag nyid bsam //
T02D3769:143a-15: skrag 'gyur ri dags gzhon nu ma'i //
T02D3769:143a-16: g-yo ba'i mig ni zil gnon mdzad //
T02D3769:143a-17: yid 'ong lha mo sgrol ma ni //
T02D3769:143a-18: g-yas logs su ni bsgom bar bya //
T02D3769:143a-19: g-yon du de bzhin ser por snang //
T02D3769:143a-20: phyag byed pa la yang dag brtson //
T02D3769:143a-21: zla ba phyed pa dang mtshungs pa'i //
T02D3769:143a-22: dpral ba dang ldan khro gnyer can //
T02D3769:143a-23: de nas snying gi'i pad dbus su //
T02D3769:143a-24: yi ge hr'i:ni yang dag bsam //
T02D3769:143a-26: gsal bar byas nas rab tu dgang //
T02D3769:143a-27: 'od zer mang po de nyid kyis //
T02D3769:143a-28: shin tu skem pa'i yi dags ltar //
T02D3769:143a-29: rang gi skra dang ba sbus g-yogs //
T02D3769:143a-30: gsus pa ri bo dag dang mtshungs //
T02D3769:143a-31: mgrin pa'i wa las byung ba yi //
T02D3769:143a-33: rus pa snabs lud bkres zas nyen //
T02D3769:143a-34: rang gi mchu dang lkog ma rnams //
T02D3769:143a-35: de rnams bltas nas bsod ldan pas //
T02D3769:143a-36: snying rje chen po bskyed byas nas //
T02D3769:143a-37: de rnams steng du lus byung ba'i //
T02D3769:143a-39: de nas snying rje'i shugs kyis ni //
T02D3769:143a-40: lag pa dag las shin tu byung //
T02D3769:143a-41: 'o ma'i rgyun gyi de dag ni //
T02D3769:143a-42: snyim ba kha dang 'brel ba dgang //
T02D3769:143a-43: de nas lo ma 'bras chan dang //
T02D3769:143a-44: 'o ma dang ni mngar gsum gyis //
T02D3769:143a-45: snod ni shin tu gang byas nas //
T02D3769:143a-46: de rnams 'di ltar bod par bya //
T02D3769:143a-47: aom a'a yantu a'a yantu ma h'a pre ta sanggha shushka ma kanthosh'a p'u ta /
T02D3769:143a-48: ksha d'i p'a s'a wa shr'i kri ta dhi ni tsi tta /
T02D3769:143a-49: ai mam ba lim gri hna ta dzi gha tha
T02D3769:143a-50: bi ba tha bh'unydza tha su khawa tyam ra ma
T02D3769:143a-51: tha / pu nar ku shal dhi ma ra tha sv'a h'a /
T02D3769:143a-52: sngags 'di yis ni yi dags kyi //
T02D3769:143a-53: rigs chen po la de nas ni //
T02D3769:143a-54: gtor ma sbyin phyir sngags 'di ni //
T02D3769:143a-55: rnal 'byor pa ni gsal bar brjod //
T02D3769:143a-56: aom na mo bha ga ba te aa pa ya
T02D3769:143a-57: bhi ru ka te dzo r'a dz'a ya ta th'a
T02D3769:143b-0: ga ta ya aarha te samyakasam @143b buddh'a ya /
T02D3769:143b-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te /
T02D3769:143b-5: h'um dzdza sarba pre ta ka la ni santarpa ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3769:143b-6: de nyid kyi phyag rgya 'byung ste lag pa gnyis
T02D3769:143b-7: kyis thal mo kha cung zad phye ba byas la
T02D3769:143b-8: mdzub mo dag rna cha'i rnam par byas pa'i phyag
T02D3769:143b-9: rgya byas te / yi dags kyi gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o /
T02D3769:143b-10: de nas chu bo de nyid 'o mar 'brub par

T02D3769:160a-28: dbus su yi ge h'um nyid dang /
T02D3769:160a-29: dzva la dzva la ya hri ste //
T02D3769:160a-30: 'di ni dgu par rab tu grags //
T02D3769:160a-31: lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam //
T02D3769:160a-32: sngags 'di brjod pas gdags par bya //
T02D3769:160a-33: tshes brgyad dam ni bcu bzhi la //
T02D3769:160a-34: lnga lnga dang ni bsre bya zhing //
T02D3769:160a-35: nyungs kar lnga yi tshad tsam gyis //
T02D3769:160a-36: de nas ri la dag byas nas //
T02D3769:160a-37: padma'i snod du bzhag nas su //
T02D3769:160a-38: stong phrag brgya ni bzlas par bya //
T02D3769:160a-39: nyin re bzhin du bza' bya zhing //
T02D3769:160a-40: thun bzhi dag tu bsgoms byas na //
T02D3769:160a-41: bskal pa'i mtha' la thug par ru //
T02D3769:160a-42: dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur //
T02D3769:160a-43: ri lu chen po zos pa yis //
T02D3769:160a-44: mdog dang gzi brjid stobs dang mthu //
T02D3769:160a-45: lnga ba smon lam nyid dang ni //
T02D3769:160a-46: mngon par shes pa lnga thog 'gyur //
T02D3769:160a-48: de ltar nang gi gtor ma ni //
T02D3769:160a-49: rtag tu bya ba rnal 'byor pas //
T02D3769:160a-50: 'dir ni dpal ldan rdo rje sems //
T02D3769:160a-51: rga shi med pa'i gnas myur 'grub //
T02D3769:160a-52: de ni nang gi gtor ma'i cho ga'o //
T02D3769:160a-53: sna tshogs rgyud kyi rgya mtsho las //
T02D3769:160a-54: bdag gis gtor ma'i cho ga ni //
T02D3769:160a-55: ma lus thams cad mnyes byed pa //
T02D3769:160a-56: rin chen tshogs mtshungs sum cu btus //
T02D3769:160a-58: gzhung tshad dgu brgyad dang ldan pa //
T02D3769:160a-59: lag mthil 'bras mtshungs gtor ma yi //
T02D3769:160a-60: sgrub thabs 'di ni bdag gis byas //
T02D3769:160a-61: rnam pa sna tshogs rgyud las btus //
T02D3769:160a-62: ngal bar gyur pa bdag gis ni //
T02D3769:160a-63: phan dang bde phyogs yang dag sgrub byed gtor ma'i sgrub thabs byas pa las //
T02D3769:160b-0: de ring zla ba'i 'od mtshungs shin tu rgya chen dge @160b ba gang bsags pa //
T02D3769:160b-1: de yis deng sang skye bo mang po bde gshegs
T02D3769:160b-2: nyid ni rab thob shog / bdag kyang srid pa
T02D3769:160b-3: 'di rung ni // rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur par shog / ma lus bde gshegs bsam bya ba //
T02D3769:160b-4: lha chen sogs kyis bsdam mi khyab //
T02D3769:160b-5: rtog pa'i rlabs ni 'joms byed blo mchog skye bo ye //
T02D3769:160b-6: snying la rtag tu shin tu brtan par gnas par
T02D3769:160b-7: byed par shog / rgyud sna tshogs las btus pa'i
T02D3769:160b-8: gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon dpal klu sgyur gyi
T02D3769:160b-9: zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3769:160b-11: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badzra'i zhal snga nas dang //
